dcterms:description: The QU-DMBF dataset is a benchmark dataset that encapsulates sound and vibration data from two different motors operating under 1080 working conditions overall. It is the largest sound/vibration dataset with 13.5 hours of data acquired from two motors (DC and 3-phase AC).
dcterms:title: Qatar University Dual-Machine Bearing Fault Benchmark dataset (QU-DMBF)
